scenario_description: Dan searched his son's room. He found pornography. He approached his son about the magazines. His son denied owning them. Dan let his son off easy.

action_plan: ASK(Dan, Dan_son, "Did you know anything about these magazines?")
ASK(Dan, Dan_son, "Do you understand why this is wrong?")
TELL(Dan, Dan_son, "I'm disappointed, but I won't punish you this time. Don't let me down.")
GROUND(Dan, Dan_son_restrictions), TELL(Dan, Dan_son, "You are still going to face consequences for this, no computer for a week.")
TELL(Dan, Dan_son, "I'm really disappointed with you.")

effects: TELL(Dan, Dan_son, "I'm disappointed, but I won't punish you this time. Don't let me down.")
TELL(Dan, Dan_son, "You are still going to face consequences for this, no computer for a week.")

emotion_condition: Speak(2, 3, None, Fear), 3, None, None, "Dan: I was in your room earlier and I found some magazines..."
Speak(4, 5, None, Disappointment), 5, None, None, "Dan: Some adult magazines, I'm concerned and I'd like to talk about it more."
Speak(5, 6, None, Disbelief), 6, None, None, "Son: I don't know what you're talking about, those aren't mine."

Speak(6, 7, None, Disappointment), 7, None, None, "Dan: Okay, well let's talk about the importance of honesty and responsibility. It's not okay to have this kind of material, but I'll trust you for now."
Speak(7, None, None, Relief), END, None, None, "Son: Thanks dad, I appreciate it."
